pushhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
推

我地今場運動證明左好多野，
證明左中聯辦治港
證明左警黑合作
證明左武警扮黑警
證明黑警會扮示威者
證明左狗鐵監控直駁狗總
再俾你地證明監控燈柱直駁大陸
仲證明左好多野！
然後呢？沒有然係，證明咁多野做咩？
呢場運動唔係捉錯處，唔係搵得越多就會贏。
場運動根本入左死局，示威者剩係識不停漫無目的咁上街示威，白白犧牲，然後港共就加強打壓。
咁樣係唔會贏架！
只有撃中港共弱點，先有資格同佢平起平坐講數。
只有港共一跪，所有野先有機會平反，要撒監控唔係去發現佢監控，然後推低支燈柱，係要去解決個源頭，否則我地同大陸人有咩分別？
大陸人一樣知中共幾醜惡，但佢地推翻唔到，證明到個政府有幾邪惡係無用架！
明明已經有咁清晰嘅弱點暴露左出黎，
唔去打佢痛處，依然每星期動員去上街，
叫叫口號拍拍手散水就可以，
然後再俾人捉幾十人去審？
經濟唔肯犧牲，時間唔肯犧牲，
旅客都唔可以犧牲。
咁只好犧牲我地年輕一代，犧牲佢地健康，
犧牲佢地健全，最後犧牲佢地性命先滿足？

大陸人一樣知中共幾醜惡，但佢地推翻唔到，證明到個政府有幾邪惡係無用架！

幫手post twitter / reddit

During the Kwun Tong Anti-Surveillance March on 24th August 2019, a smart lamppost has been taken down by the protestors against mass surveillance.

The protestors found out that the components of the smart lamppost were made in China by Tickteck Technology. Upon further researches, it is discovered that Sansi Technology is the mother company of Tickteck Technology. Sansi Technology cooperated with Huawei Corporation and HGC Global Communications. HGC provides facial recognition solutions, thus these lampposts can record and analyse the data with facial recognition program for surveillance purpose. The surveillance system has a back door and it is confirmed that the data would be sent to China with location at which the data was collected.

There is sound evidence to prove that the data collected would be sent to China. A protestor was arrested by the China's Police when he was entering China. The protestor discovered that he was recorded by the surveillance lamppost and identified by the facial recognition system.

China would assemble all the data collected by the smart lamppost from different countries including but not limtied to the UK, Canada, Singapore and Spain.

Every country which has used surveillance system made in China are being watched by the China's governemnt, in a way similar to the people of Xinjiang who are under full surveillance.
China's government is watching you.

#chinazi

TIMELINE
7月14日 監控關注組發出公開信
7月16日 政府發新聞稿澄清並閹割燈柱功能
7月16日 明報出社論批passive RFID不存在風險
8月21日 晚上7時民間記者會發出822監控記者會採通
8月22日 下午一時政府發出新聞稿表示會成立獨立小組解釋燈柱疑慮
8月22日 下午二時民間記者會7th 監控:香港
8月24日 下午三時觀塘遊行燈柱因天雨路滑跣低
8月24日 下午四時網民核爆式由燈柱屍駭發現中共監控秘密
8月24日 晚上23:24政府新聞稿回應大肆破壞多條智慧燈柱屬不可理喻
8月25日 零晨一時政府已在維修燈柱

證明黑警會扮示威者
證明左狗鐵監控直駁狗總
再俾你地證明監控燈柱直駁大陸
仲證明左好多野！
然後呢？沒有然係，證明咁多野做咩？
呢場運動唔係捉錯處，唔係搵得越多就會贏。港共根本一步一步謀殺緊香港人。
場運動根本入左死局，示威者剩係識不停漫無目的咁上街示威，白白犧牲，然後港共就加強打壓。
咁樣係唔會贏架！
只有撃中港共弱點，先有資格同佢平起平坐講數。
只有港共一跪，所有野先有機會平反，要撒監控唔係去發現佢監控，然後推低支燈柱，係要去解決個源頭，否則我地同大陸人有咩分別？
大陸人一樣知中共幾醜惡，但佢地推翻唔到，證明到個政府有幾邪惡係無用架！
明明已經有咁清晰嘅弱點暴露左出黎，
機場就係港共春袋
唔去打佢痛處，依然每星期動員去上街，叫叫口號拍拍手散水就可以？
然後再俾人捉幾十人去審？
經濟唔肯犧牲，時間唔肯犧牲，
旅客都唔可以犧牲。
咁只好犧牲我地年輕一代，犧牲佢地健康，
犧牲佢地健全，最後犧牲佢地性命先滿足？

quote.msg:
幫手post twitter / reddit

During the Kwun Tong Anti-Surveillance March on 24th August 2019, a smart lamppost has been taken down by the protestors against mass surveillance.

The protestors found out that the components of the smart lamppost were made in China by Tickteck Technology. Upon further researches, it is discovered that Sansi Technology is the mother company of Tickteck Technology. Sansi Technology cooperated with Huawei Corporation and HGC Global Communications. HGC provides facial recognition solutions, thus these lampposts can record and analyse the data with facial recognition program for surveillance purpose. The surveillance system has a back door and it is confirmed that the data would be sent to China with location at which the data was collected.

There is sound evidence to prove that the data collected would be sent to China. A protestor was arrested by the China's Police when he was entering China. The protestor discovered that he was recorded by the surveillance lamppost and identified by the facial recognition system.

China would assemble all the data collected by the smart lamppost from different countries including but not limtied to the UK, Canada, Singapore and Spain.

Every country which has used surveillance system made in China are being watched by the China's governemnt, in a way similar to the people of Xinjiang who are under full surveillance.
China's government is watching you.

#chinazi
,

唔識POST REDDIT
有冇人幫手post
